creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: squat, low bowl with gray-green glaze; diagonal zigzagging lines circle the bowl near lip; domed cover with multiple rings of zigzagging diagonal lines; ring of flowers around widest portion; bowl sits on very low foot
markings: N.V. Hammer Far Eastern Art sticker inside lid
medium: Buncheong ware with stamped design under glaze
title: Covered box with wavy lines and chrysanthemums
